## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated AGENTS.md (if agents were modified)
- [ ] I have updated DEPLOYMENT.md (if deployment process changed)
- [ ] I have added/updated inline code comments
- [ ] I have updated API documentation (if applicable)

### Security

- [ ] I have not committed any sensitive information (API keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have considered security implications of my changes
- [ ] I have updated security documentation (if applicable)

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have updated requirements.txt (Python)
- [ ] I have updated package.json (Node.js)
- [ ] I have checked for dependency vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have tested with the new dependencies
